Module lanat
Package lanat.parsing.errors

Interface Error.CustomError

All Superinterfaces:
Error<ParseErrorContext>, Error.ParseError, ErrorLevelProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomErrorImpl
Enclosing interface:
Error<C extends ErrorContext>
public static interface Error.CustomError extends Error.ParseError
A custom error. Indicates a failure in the parsing process in an ArgumentType.

Allows offsetting the index of the error. This is used by ArgumentTypes to offset the index of the error when the error is dispatched to a parent ArgumentType.
